ygData.subject: Re: Guk expedition- A Total Wash-OUT
ygData.msgSnippet: Aiya, Sorri to hear that u guys had a terrible time :( Im still at Guk, found some mesh and woven. It is Soooooo diffucult to get things from this frogs! was
ygData.messageBody:
Aiya,
Sorri to hear that u guys had a terrible time :(

Im still at Guk, found some mesh and woven.
It is Soooooo diffucult to get things from this frogs! was killed by a Tons
and Witch doctor Flogglock tis morning :P
Trifrost has to SOw me so i can get there without much pain.

i/m not hunting there now unless got full team. Was with a full good team
today and killed lotsa.
Im coming back to FP and then HH pass.

well, at least we went guk and its off our chest , for now, untill we hit
lvl 20+..hehehe

Yiyang'ing at Guk

-----Original Message-----
From: Leshrec <leshrec@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Date: Saturday, June 19, 1999 8:38 AM
Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Guk expedition -ToNite-Friday


>From: "Leshrec" <leshrec@...>
>
>Yeah thats the importance of having invisibility.. Not only troll guards
>reside there but named troll npcs too..
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Gary Qui Hong Loong <kanglun@...>
>To: sg-everquest@onelist.com <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
>Date: Saturday, June 19, 1999 6:35 AM
>Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Guk expedition -ToNite-Friday
>
>
>>From: Gary Qui Hong Loong <kanglun@...>
>>
>>wah, Serphe and me kana wacked by the troll guards. Had to spend 1 whole
>>hour to get stuff back sheesh
>>
>>

>>> > >

>>> > >
>>> > >Yiyang

>>> > >>>> >From: Alex <leealex@...>

>>> >

>>> > >>>> >>From: "Alex" <leealex@...>
>>> > >>>> >>
>>> > >>>> >>Thx u Serp and Lesh for the feedback.
>>> > >>>> >>
>>> > >>>> >>LOL, Im more Greedy than Crazy.. hmmmm i think
>>> > both..A crazy greedy
>>> > >>monk.
>>> > >>>> >>
>>> > >>>> >>Let's hit Guk than.
>>> > >>>> >>
>>> > >>>> >>There's my proposal. Please let me have your ideas
>>> > and most imporatnt
>>> > >>of
>>> > >>>> >>all, WHEN and how long u can play and stay B4
>>> > log-out.
>>> > >>>> >>
>>> > >>>> >>1) We Meet at Oasis, 1st Pillar make our way to
>>> > Innoulthe Swamp on
>>> > >>Friday
>>> > >>>> >>evening 9:00 PM.
>>> > >>>> >>2) Look around and hunt a bit if still got time
>>> > >>>> >>3) Saturday Morning: 9:00AM , go GUK and Kick ass!.
>>> >
>>> > >>>> >>
>>> > >>>> >>Your ideas and suggestion pls, some of u have the
>>> > experiment at Guk
>>> > >and
>>> > >>>> >>swamp, pls share.
>>> > >>>> >>
>>> > >>>> >>So far, the following ppl r interested, except
>>> > timing not confirm.
>>> > >>>> >>1) Leshrec-Wiz
>>> > >>>> >>2) Garren- Pal
>>> > >>>> >>3) Trifrost-Shaman
>>> > >>>> >>4) Ziltus-Wiz
>>> > >>>> >>5) Yiyang-Monk
>>> > >>>> >>
>>> > >>>> >>Let's confirm this b4 Friday evening tommorrow. if
>>> > last min, some of
>>> > u
>>> > >>>> cant
>>> > >>>> >>make it (overtime etc) ,np. we will see how and
>>> > decide if we can
>>> > still
>>> > >>>> >>continue, BUT the expedition is ON .
>>> > >>>> >>
>>> > >>>> >>Yiyang'ing to Guk
>>> > >>>> >>
>>> > >>>> >>
>>> > >>>> >>-----Original Message-----
>>> > >>>> >>From: Leshrec <leshrec@...>
>>> > >>>> >>To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
>>> > >>>> >>Date: Thursday, June 17, 1999 12:04 PM
>>> > >>>> >>Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Guk expedition ??
>>> > >>>> >>
>>> > >>>> >>
>>> > >>>> >>>From: "Leshrec" <leshrec@...>
>>> > >>>> >>>
>>> > >>>> >>>ermm lower guk is for level 35+ and the boots
>>> > dosen't load there
>>> > does
>>> > >>it?
>>> > >>>> >I
>>> > >>>> >>>thought it loads in Najena. Anyways, I really need
>>> > woven stuff there
>>> > >>so
>>> > >>>> >I'm
>>> > >>>> >>>up for it ) Actually, we can camp at an area in
>>> > GUK when the stuff
>>> > >>there
>>> > >>>> >is
>>> > >>>> >>>about 16-20. Knights and warriors there and
>>> > sometimes, shamans and
>>> > >>witch
>>> > >>>> >>>doctors. btw, theres a woven grass bracer which
>>> > loads there which is
>>> > >>>> quite
>>> > >>>> >>>good. Forgot the stats, but i saw it selling for
>>> > about 20pp. That
>>> > >>named
>>> > >>>> >npc
>>> > >>>> >>>frog also goes around occasionally and we should
>>> > be able to take him
>>> > >>on.
>>> > >>>> >>>
>>> > >>>> >>>-----Original Message-----
>>> > >>>> >>>From: Alex <leealex@...>
>>> > >>>> >>>To: sg-everquest@onelist.com
>>> > <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
>>> > >>>> >>>Date: Thursday, June 17, 1999 9:48 AM
>>> > >>>> >>>Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Guk expedition ??
>>> > >>>> >>>
>>> > >>>> >>>
>>> > >>>> >>>>From: "Alex" <leealex@...>
>>> > >>>> >>>>
>>> > >>>> >>>>I have been postponing the trip to Guk for the
>>> > foloowing selfish
>>> > >>reasons
>>> > >>>> >>:P
>>> > >>>> >>>>
>>> > >>>> >>>>1) The lower guk has very mean monsters(2oth-30th
>>> > lvl) that carries
>>> > >>nice
>>> > >>>> >>>>stuff: There my shopping list:
>>> > >>>> >>>>a)collar of undead protection, 5hp,7 vs disease
>>> > and poison,
>>> > >>>> >>>>b)The Jorneyman boots-slightly slower than SOW,
>>> > just click on it
>>> > and
>>> > >>>> >>>>run.-Very nice
>>> > >>>> >>>>c) Silverplate plate bracers-+ 7hp (upperguk)
>>> > >>>> >>>>d) Azure sleeves +12hp weight only 0.4 (lower
>>> > guk)
>>> > >>>> >>>>e) Kobold boots
>>> > >>>> >>>>f) mesh , mesh mesh
>>> > >>>> >>>>and the animated Hand that gives out ????
>>> > >>>> >>>>
>>> > >>>> >>>>2) My lvl is only 17th , cant hit the lower guk
>>> > yet. I can hit the
>>> > >>upper
>>> > >>>> >>>guk
>>> > >>>> >>>>Gaz, taz warriors for the mesh but the next time
>>> > i go back to lower
>>> > >>guk,
>>> > >>>> >>my
>>> > >>>> >>>>factions with them is so bad that any frogglock
>>> > and Kolbold that
>>> > >will
>>> > >>>> KOS
>>> > >>>> >>>me
>>> > >>>> >>>>onsight. I hope to hit 20+ lvl go striagth into
>>> > lower guk and
>>> > storm
>>> > >>the
>>> > >>>> >>>>buggers.
>>> > >>>> >>>>
>>> > >>>> >>>>3) Is so difficult to gather a group at the FIX
>>> > day and time to
>>> > >hunt
>>> > >>>> for
>>> > >>>> >>>at
>>> > >>>> >>>>least 3-4 hrs, camp there and go back in again at
>>> > a later
>>> > >>time-Together
>>> > >>>> >>and
>>> > >>>> >>>>so on. It IS very important to be in Group.
>>> > >>>> >>>>
>>> > >>>> >>>>There my suggested list of personal in the Guk
>>> > group
>>> > >>>> >>>>a) at least 1 monk
>>> > >>>> >>>>b) at least 1 Paladin
>>> > >>>> >>>>c) 1 Shaman
>>> > >>>> >>>>d) 1 Wiz
>>> > >>>> >>>>c) 1 rogue
>>> > >>>> >>>>d) anyone/any char
>>> > >>>> >>>>
>>> > >>>> >>>>Monk and paladin to tank, shaman to hit and buff,
>>> > wiz to ROOT and
>>> > >>>> >>hit -this
>>> > >>>> >>>>4 char r the mininum for a group. Xp is NOt the
>>> > purpose. It the
>>> > >>Goodies
>>> > >>>> >we
>>> > >>>> >>>>all want. i say if u r below lvl 10th also can
>>> > come for the
>>> > >>adventure,
>>> > >>>> >>>thats
>>> > >>>> >>>>if u dont mind the xp.
>>> > >>>> >>>>Garren is now 18th Pal
>>> > >>>> >>>>Leshrec is 17th Wiz, can made 18th by weekend, np
>>> >
>>> > >>>> >>>>Yiyang 17th Monk, may nit make 18th by weekend-
>>> > got problem :P
>>> > >>>> >>>>Trifrost 14th Shaman, can make 15th by weekend,
>>> > np
>>> > >>>> >>>>
>>> > >>>> >>>>Some of u are experience in Guk eg, Garren
>>> > ,Sereph and Leshrec, etc
>>> > >,
>>> > >>>> >your
>>> > >>>> >>>>comments pls.
>>> > >>>> >>>>
>>> > >>>> >>>>Please add and correct on the above. Im open for
>>> > the Expedition to
>>> > >>Guk.
>>> > >>>> >>>>Today is Thursday. Wanna meets on Saturday
>>> > mornning?? I hve to log
>>> > >>at
>>> > >>>> >>>>1:00pm and be back at 8:pm. suggestion please.
>>> > >>>> >>>>
>>> > >>>> >>>>Yiyang of Innoruuk
>>> > >>>> >>>>
